News.Title: Biden proposes 30% climate change tax on cryptocurrency mining
News.Desc: The White House is trying to persuade Congress to pass a 30% tax on the electricity used in cryptocurrency mining in the next federal budget in order to minimize the nascent industry’s impact on climate change.

News.Title: Market Wrap: Bitcoin Outperforms as Crypto Bulls Take a Breather
News.Desc: Bitcoin (BTC) outperformed altcoins on Friday, suggesting that buyers are taking a breather ahead of the weekend. Analysts expect a brief pullback before another leg higher in crypto prices.

News.Title: Bitcoin City: El Salvador’s Dreams for Utopia on Hold
News.Desc: Locals interviewed by CoinDesk have mixed feelings about El Salvador’s multimillion dollar proposal financed by “bitcoin bonds.

News.Title: History That We Can Trust
News.Desc: Blockchain technology creates first record of events that can't be rewritten.

News.Title: CANADA FX DEBT-Canadian dollar pares weekly gain as Ukraine tensions soar
News.Desc: Wall Street tumbled and safe-havens such as U.S. Treasuries and the U.S. dollar rallied after Washington said Russia has massed enough troops near Ukraine to launch a major invasion. The Canadian dollar was trading 0.2% lower at 1.2742 to the greenback, or 78.78 U.S. cents, after trading in a range of 1.2670 to 1.2754.

News.Title: The CEO of Uber said the ride-hailing app will 'absolutely' accept crypto at some point
News.Desc: USD/CAD returned towards the 50 EMA level and is trying to gain additional downside momentum.
